motivatedToFollow(DinoActor) - Method in class game.follow.FollowFoodOnGroundBehaviour

motivatedToFollow(DinoActor) - Method in class game.follow.FollowFoodOnPlantBehaviour

motivatedToFollow(DinoActor) - Method in class game.follow.FollowVictimBehaviour
